traits.name: Corvette Command (Tactic)
traits.description:
Choose one Corvette Escort assigned to your battlegroup and give them one of the following commands: 
● Trade Blows 
Deal 2 damage to target Wing, or deal 4 damage to target Capital Ship and take 2 damage in return. 
● Defensive Formation 
Add +2 to your battlegroup’s Interdiction until the start of your next turn. 
● Gun Run 
Limited 1 
Deal 2 Area damage to target battlegroup. You may consume Lock On as part of this command to deal +2 Area damage to that Capital Ship or Escort. This damage cannot be Interdicted.
